name: Healthy Chicken and Squash Moroccan Stew
ingredients: 2 lb. skinless, boneless thighs cut into chunks
1 medium onion cut into thin wedges
1 large summer squash, quartered lengthwise and cut in 1‚Äù pieces
instructions: In bowl combine chicken, garlic, cumin, coriander, pepper and cinnamon, toss to coat.
Spray a pan with pam and cook over medium heat until brown on all sides.
Transfer to a 4 qt. slow cooker.
Add lentils and onion to chicken mix in slow cooker.
Pour chicken broth and water over.
Cover and cook on low for 7-8 hours or on high for 3 1/2-4 hours.
Add squash and apricots to slow cooker.
I did it on the stove top.
